messages.content: I wish I had known this when my kitty ran off years ago. 😭
All I want for Christmas is a broken home
Good for you! I wish I had run for my life at 18, but brainwashing is real
Yo where they at, I want to celebrate with them.
Don't see a W tonight. We need a miracle.
I want to change though. If I'm around those people I will remain the same way. Right?
Not yet! But I waiting for a miracle any year now!!
I just spent the whole week sneaking away to smoke, and trying to get into some girls shorts.
shaved definitely makes things more swampy for me. I need the hair to soak up the swamp
Okay rude. Leave [NAME] alone and where he is please. I’ve been rooting for this kid since his first match.
I love [NAME], but man I wish I knew what [NAME] would have been like here.
I WANTED GENERAL LUCK TO MARCH TO NEW ENGLAND AND *THEN* GET SPANKED UP AND DOWN THE FIELD FOR 60 MINUTES.
I would focus on being an enlisted Marine first. That’s what you’ll be doing for the next 4 years.
Germany is the first country in Europe I've been to! Planning on Ireland next, and maybe Croatia(hoping for Germany again, though :) )
